frontMatter.title: üè∏ Play at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
frontMatter.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium as the Meath Leagues return this week. Practice your game with all courts open and everyone welcome!

prev.title: Join Us for Beginner Club Night at Navan Badminton Club
prev.summary: Join Navan Badminton Club for a fun Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium this Thursday from 9pm - 11pm. All skill levels welcome!

next.title: Meath Leagues Return with Exciting Matches
next.summary: The Meath Leagues are back with matches on 16th October 2024. Support our teams as they aim for victory!
